// src/pages/AboutPage.jsx import React from 'react'; import './AboutPage.css'; import Logo from '../components/Logo'; import falcon from '../assets/jets/Falcon.png'; import skyLiner200 from '../assets/jets/SkyLiner200.png'; import horizon700 from '../assets/jets/Horizon700.png'; function AboutPage({ onBackToStore }) { return (

Welcome to JetVerse

At JetVerse, we don't just sell jets — we deliver a tailored aviation experience. Our curated fleet features top-tier aircraft built for performance, luxury, and safety. We proudly serve high-end clients, corporations, and private jet aficionados worldwide.

Why Choose JetVerse?

  • ✔️ A handpicked fleet of the world's finest jets
  • ✔️ Personalized consultation to match your needs
  • ✔️ Transparent pricing and ownership guidance
  • ✔️ Post-sale support including maintenance planning and crew recruitment
  • ✔️ Discreet, global delivery and registration handling

Your Journey, Our Expertise

From your first inquiry to your first flight, our expert advisors will guide you every step of the way. We believe buying a jet should feel as smooth and premium as flying one.

JetVerse is committed to long-term relationships, not just transactions. Whether you're upgrading, expanding your fleet, or making your first acquisition — we're here to help you soar.

); } export default AboutPage;
